page.title: 08MONTREY RESERVOIR
page.content: On Wednesday 26th June a man called Mr. Martin _Jones came to school to tell us about Montrey Reservoir.It is situated to the North _ West of Arch Lane Farm.He told us that the Victorians built it and that now they are putting a roof on it to stop pollution, they are also putting a new floor over the top of the old one which was made ot of clay and bricks. The people in Liverpool get their water from Wales the River Dee and Rivington. The Reservoir is fifteen feet deep,the water in it comes from Rivington.The roof is to be made of Aluminium because it has to be light. The floor is to be concrete blocks. Mr.Martin_Jones doesn,t actually work at the Reservoir because it is all computerised, he works at the North West Water Authority.He draws the plans of Reservoirs.
